description.value:
The shaman touches a willing creature (including herself ) and enshrouds that creature in mist. This grants the creature concealment as the @Compendium[pf1.spells.18kryvj2dfuymk9d]{Blur} spell. The mist dissipates after it causes an attack to miss because of concealment or after 1 minute, whichever comes first.

At 8th and 16th levels, the mist lasts for one additional attack.

A creature affected by this hex cannot be affected by it again for 24 hours.
